meanings.sent1: The cat's fur was tawnier than the sand on the beach.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was tawnier than the autumn leaves.
meanings.sent3: The tawnier paint color made the room feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: The tawnier sky signaled the approaching sunset.
meanings.sent5: The tawnier hue of the old photograph brought back memories of childhood.

meanings.definition: More tan in color than something else.
meanings.sent1: The tawnier shoes stood out among the darker ones in the store.
meanings.sent2: His tawnier complexion contrasted with his friend's pale skin.
meanings.sent3: The tawnier cake frosting looked like a delicious caramel treat.
meanings.sent4: The tawnier leaves on the tree whispered of the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The tawnier sand on the shore sparkled in the sunlight.
